section.name: Overview
section.p: Commons IO uses Maven 1, Maven 2 or Ant as a build system.

You may also be interested in the upgrade notes:
Upgrade from 1.3.2 to 1.4
Upgrade from 1.3, or 1.3.1 to 1.3.2
Upgrade from 1.3 to 1.3.1
Upgrade from 1.2 to 1.3
Upgrade from 1.1 to 1.2
Upgrade from 1.0 to 1.1

section.name: Maven 2 Goals
section.p: The following Maven 2 commands can be used to build io:

ul.li: mvn test - compile and run the unit tests
mvn install - build the jar and install in local maven repository
mvn site assembly:assembly - Create the source and binary distributions

section.name: Maven 1 Goals
section.p: The following Maven 1 commands can be used to build io:

ul.li: maven test - compile and run the unit tests
maven dist - Create the source and binary distributions

section.name: Ant Goals
section.p: The following Maven 1 commands can be used to build io:

ul.li: ant test - compile and run the unit tests (requires JDK 1.4+)
ant dist - Create the source and binary distributions

section.p: N.B.The ant build is JDK dependant. Building with JDK 1.3 excludes JDK 1.4 dependant classes.
